ðŸ“– Summary: The python-hdwallet library is a Python-based tool for generating Hierarchical Deterministic (HD) wallets, supporting over 200 cryptocurrencies. It offers a flexible solution for developers integrating multi-currency wallet functionality, adhering to standard protocols for compatibility and providing secure seed generation and key management.
